name: Zomborg Assault
description:
Zomborg Assault is a top-down 2D wave defensive shooter with different weapons, powerups, and upgrades! Try to keep the Generator alive by protecting it from the endless onslaught of enemies! Pickup powerups and get points each round and spend them in the points menu! Compete against other players in an online leaderboard!

Created by Andrew G, also known as fablefox

All sprites, programming, music, and 90% of the sound effects done by me. 

Thank you to UF Game Developer's Association, I don't think I could have finished this game without their wonderful community keeping me motivated and inspired to keep on going!

I will not be adding any huge updates to the game. But I may fix bugs and add some more music and art to the game!
